activities: Datameer, Inc. processes personal data relating to (1) employees of Datameer, Inc. for purposes of global HR administration and management; and (2) individual actual and prospective customers, and individual representatives of actual and prospective customers, distributors, suppliers, and other business partners in the EU, for the purposes of invoicing, communicating, promoting and marketing our product and administering the business relationship with such corporate business partners, as described in Datameer’s Privacy Policy. Datameer also collects user behavior data relating to its product for the purpose of product improvement and does not contain any personal data beyond what is previously provided by the user.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, Email Address, Phone Number, Company, Industry, Job Function, Country, State/Province.
recoursemech: Agrees to cooperate and comply with EU and/or Swiss Data Protection Authorities.
